body_html: For Linux we are supporting Ubuntu 14 and newer which has 7.35. RHEL 6 currently does have an older version at 7.19, but that is 6 years old at this point and ending its production phase 1. We don't generally promise to make changes to support older Linux systems, but maybe this is an easy change. @jart could you take this?

body: For Linux we are supporting Ubuntu 14   and newer which has 7.35.  RHEL 6 currently does have an older version at 7.19, but that is 6 years old at this point and ending its production phase 1. We don't generally promise to make changes to support older Linux systems, but maybe this is an easy change.   @jart could you take this?
